data.title: Street Improvement Projects
data.text:
CDBG Road Grant- 2024 Project

The road reconstruction project funded by the dedicated ¼ cent for infrastructure of the ½ cent sales tax, along with a matching CDBG grant that was awarded, kicked off in the southeast area of the City of Duncan in April. These 40 blocks will be done, with plans for an additional 30 blocks, during the 2024 asphalt season.
